histogram.name: Toast.FailedToShow
histogram.summary: Logs the ToastId of the toast that fails to show to users. This is logged each time a feature attempts to trigger the toast and a toast does not appear.

histogram.name: Toast.FrequencyPrefChanged
histogram.summary: Logs the message frequency pref every time the user changes it on the settings page. This is used to understand how often users change this setting.

histogram.name: Toast.TriggeredToShow
histogram.summary: Logs the ToastId of the toast that is triggered to shown to users. This is logged each time a feature triggers the toast and is used to learn how often users see a particular toast.

histogram.name: Toast.{ToastName}.Dismissed
histogram.summary: Logs the reason why the {ToastName} toast was dismissed. This is used to gain insight on if the user ignores or interacts with the toast.

histogram.name: Toast.{ToastName}.DismissMenuClicked
histogram.summary: Logs the dismiss menu item a user clicked to dismiss the {ToastName} toast. This is used to gain insight on which toasts a user dismisses.
